metadata.name: Woman#01
metadata.description:
Polaroid SX70. Portraits of people or groups approached in the street or on a path. At a bus stop, in a field...  Each time, a single image. I like the expectation of this picture. An expectation
shared with the people photographed. The randomness of the image, the instability. 
During the trip, and afterwards, the black and white photographs took on tones. A little yellow, a little pink... I kept these tints when they were scanned

Buy and get a fine art print 20X20cm
